text: The Sehol X7 is a mid-size Crossover SUV produced by JAC Motors under the Sehol brand. It was launched in 2020 and is an updated version of the previous model, the JAC Refine S7. == History == The Sehol X7 was first introduced under the Jiayue brand as the Jiayue X7 in 2020. It was developed as an extensive update to the JAC Refine S7. In October 2020, the Jiayue brand was discontinued, in 2021 and the model was rebranded as the Sol X7. In the same year JAC restructured its brands, and the model was marketed as the Sehol X7. In Iran the X7 is sold under the KMC K7 name.. == Features == The Sehol X7 offers two engine options: a 1.5-liter turbo engine producing 174 hp and a 2.0-liter turbo engine with 190 hp. Both engines are paired with a 6-speed dual-clutch transmission. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Sehol X7
